verses.roman:
kṛṣṇa yadi pṛthivīte karena avatāra
prathame karena guru-vargera sañcāra

synonyms: kṛṣṇa—Lord Kṛṣṇa; yadi—if; pṛthivīte—on the earth; karena—makes; avatāra—incarnation; prathame—first; karena—makes; guru-vargera—of the group of respectable predecessors; sañcāra—the advent.
translation: Whenever Śrī Kṛṣṇa desires to manifest His incarnation on earth, first He creates the incarnations of His respectable predecessors.
